Test Name: Eastern Equine Encephalitis Antibody Panel (IgG and IgM), Spinal Fluid
Purpose: Detection and quantification of IgG and IgM antibodies against Eastern Equine Encephalitis virus.
Container: Sterile screw-cap spinal fluid collection tube
Equipment: ELISA or immunofluorescence assay kit with microplate reader, calibrated micropipettes, 37 Â°C incubator, centrifuge, vortex mixer
